    • Method Detail

      • getEntity

        public static <T extends Entity> T getEntity(java.util.UUID id,
                             World world,
                             java.lang.Class<T> clazz)
        Gets the entity with the specified UUID of the specified type. This method will search the specified world and will return the first entity with the specified UUID.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the entity.
        Parameters:
        clazz - The type of the entity.
        id - The persistent universally unique identifier of the entity.
        world - The world to search.
        Returns:
        The first known entity with the specified identifier, or null if not found.

      • getEntity

        public static <T extends Entity> T getEntity(java.util.UUID id,
                             java.lang.Class<T> clazz)
        Gets the entity with the specified UUID of the specified type. This method will search all worlds registered with the Bukkit API, and will return the first entity with the specified UUID.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the entity.
        Parameters:
        id - The persistent universally unique identifier of the entity.
        Returns:
        The first known entity with the specified identifier, or null if not found.

      • getEntitiesInRange

        public static <T extends Entity> java.util.List<T> getEntitiesInRange(Location center,
                                                      double range,
                                                      java.lang.Class<T> clazz)
        Gets a set of entities within a certain range.

        Implementation Note: This method uses Location.distanceSquared(Location) for distance comparison to reduce the computational expense of this method. This method will also only iterate through entities in the world specified by the center location.

        Parameters:
        center - The centerpoint of the circular range.
        range - The radius of the circle representing the range. Negative values are treated as if they were positive.
        clazz - The type of the entities being found. This may be Entity.class for all entities.
        Returns:
        A non-null list of all entities within the specified range from the specified location.

      • getDamagers

        public static java.util.List<DamageData> getDamagers(java.util.UUID entityId)
        Gets the list of recent damagers of the entity with the specified ID, as tracked by the utility event listener.

        The sum of the damage amounts of the values in the list should equal the current health of the entity.

        The list of damage information values is copied, such that modifications to the returned list will not affect the internal data store.

        The returned list is sorted such that the first element will represent the most recent damage source and the last element will represent the last damage source that has still played a part in entity damage.

        Due to the returned list being cloned, this reference is not necessarily valid for multiple server ticks.

        Parameters:
        entityId - The UUID of the entity for which to retrieve damager data.
        Returns:
        A mutable list of damage information about the specified entity.

      • getDamagers

        public static java.util.List<DamageData> getDamagers(Entity entity)
        Gets the list of recent damagers of the specified entity, as tracked by the utility event listener.
        Parameters:
        entity - The entity for which to retrieve damager data.
        Returns:
        A list of damage information about the specified entity.
        See Also:
        getDamagers(UUID)
